name: Death House (Goddess-of-Gales)
description:
Dungeons and Dragons meets Choose your Adventure in this fan-made visual novel that's based on the dungeon "Death House" in the beginning of the Curse of Strahd campaign. In the game you play as the humble moon druid, Faylen—the first D&D character I ever made. Unlock all the secrets of Death House in this survival gothic-horror themed  visual novel.

One unique feature of the game involves the option of rolling your own dice (1d20) to determine the success or failed outcomes of certain scenarios (ability checks and saving throws). The game is pre-set to roll the dice automatically, but there is an option for manual rolls in which you will input the amount rolled on die face. You don't need to make a full D&D character sheet to enjoy the game, but if you feel inspired to then go for it!  Have fun ~ :D

Features

  •  You play the role of a moon druid wood elf named Faylen
  • +60,000 words (roughly 2-4 hours of gameplay / playthrough)
  • 5 additional party members. Platonic friendships with MC.
  • 5 unique "Happy" endings, as well as a few possibilities of Game Over aka "Bad" endings. Save often!
  • SFW
  • Suggested ages 13+ Contains some horror-themed images/scenarios that may be considered disturbing to some audiences.
The Party: Faylen, Asher, Julius, Molly, Sprout, and Azarmiel

Main Story is 100% compete and ready for open beta testing. However, I still plan on adding more artwork—including CG images—to the game.
I'd also like to include bonus features, such as a Music Room, Image Gallery, and Achievements system.

I'm not accepting donations at this time, but if you like my art and would like to help support me, consider commissioning me in the future. It will help me continue making a living off of doing what I love ~

https://www.deviantart.com/goddess-of-gales/art/Commissions-Summer-2021-OPEN-738249383

If you can't afford a commission, then consider sharing this project with anyone you think might enjoy it. Being able to share my work with others is what keeps me motivated to create fun projects like this one ~ Thanks for playing ~ : )

If you'd like to help me work towards improving this project—and future projects as well—after playing the game, please fill out the survey below and tell me what you think! You can answer the questions in a comment or message them to me privately on DeviantArt/Twitter. Whenever the next update is released, your name/username will appear in the credits under Beta Testers.

Beta Testing Survey

1. Were you able to finish the VN? If so which of the five character endings did you get?

2. What impressed you the most about the VN? Why is it your favorite?

3. What impressed you the least? Why is it your least favorite?

4. Do you have a favorite/least favorite character? What do you like/dislike about them?

5. Was the VN's layout easy to follow? Did you feel a need for more explanation on how to work the controls / play the game?

6. Are there any additional features you'd like to see added to the game?

7. Based on this VN, how interested would you be in playing future VNs that I make?

8. Have you or do you plan on unlocking all five of the available endings (excluding Game Overs)?

9. How do you feel about the protagonist? Do you prefer VNs where the protagonist has a unique character design/personality? Or do you prefer the MC's looks/personality to be left open to the player's imagination?

10. Feel free to add anything else you'd like to comment on.

11. Would you like your real name or username to be put in the game's credits?

Thanks for your support ~ :D
